Html:
Hi,

I need to drag a marker and arrange my linegraph, I see the Draggable class, but I don't know how add Draggables and bind to my marker. I see EditableShapes example, but I don't know how I integrate them.

Also, I need to restrict to drag only in X coordinates. =)

BTW, thanks for the good framework.

Hi,

It seems to me that I have not understood you need perfectly. Do you need by dragging some marker translate some chart? Or do you want by dragging a marker edit data that is drawn in line chart?

DraggablePoint class has a Position property and PositionChanged event, that may be useful to you.

Regards,

Mikhail.
